PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xD02090=== Cornered Prey | Bleed === ^7We apply bleed via ^x70FF70Storm Rain^7, which only converts ^xADAA4750% of its Physical Damage to Lightning^7 the 2 Small Nodes leading up to ^xAF6025Cornered Prey ^7give ^xE0503020% Chance to apply Bleed^7. ^x70FF70Storm Rain^7 has massive amounts of Hits, so on any ^xFFFF77Rare^7 or ^xAF6025Unique^7 we will apply the Bleed early The Node is so Strong, we have to use it so we drop ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 and get ^x70FF70Frenzy Charges^7 via ^xAF6025Mark Mastery^7 This also allows us to use ^xAF6025Excess Sustenance^7 if we need a lot of Life on Hit with the absurd amount of Hits ^x70FF70Storm Rain^7 can cause
^xD02090=== Crit Swap ===^7 ^7To Crit Swap you just need enough Passive Points to allocate all the Crit Nodes and Spec out the^7 ^xAF6025Precise Technique^7 It is also recommended to upgrade your ^xFFFF77Rares^7 to a good State. Refer to my Crafting Video or Crafting Guides how to craft them yourself.
^xD02090===LINK SETUPS ===^7
--- Main Skill Setup | LA VS RoA --- ^7Generaly preference at the moment is ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows (RoA)^7 > ^x70FF70Lightning Arrow (LA) ^7until 4-Link, with 4-Link I prefer to swap to ^x70FF70LA^7 and at latest I swap to ^x70FF70LA^7 post Lab 2 with ^xAF6025Far Shot^7 ^x70FF70Elemental Hit of the Spectrum^7 over both once available for everything but Legion [In this Case i force the Swap ASAP] However I like to keep my Build Flexible
My Deciding Factors if I want to go ^x70FF70LA^7 Act 1: If I have 2 ^x70FF70GGG^7 on any Armour Piece, I will grab^x70FF70 Lightning Arrow^7 at Level 12 and buy a^x70FF70 Lesser Multiple Projectile (LPM)^7 OTHERWISE, I will grab ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7 and buy a ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage^7, if I haven't done before. ^x70FF70[Added Cold ^7can be bought early at Level 8 if you have a ^x70FF70GGG^7 already and are doing well on Wisdoms so can afford to buy it with 1 ^x8888FFTransmute^7]
4-Link: If I am not on ^x70FF70LA^7 yet, this is the second Window to swap to it, when I get a ^xE05030R^7^x70FF70GGG ^7or ^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70GGG^7 Link, I will swap to ^x70FF70Lightning Arrow^7, IF I can afford the swap. [2 ^x8888FFTransmutes^7 for ^x70FF70LA^7 & ^x70FF70LMP^7, 1 ^x7070FFAlteration^7 for ^x7070FFTrinity^7/^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 and potentialy 3rd ^x8888FFTransmute^7 for ^x70FF70Faster Attacks ^7for ^x70FF70Artillery Ballista^7] I can afford the Swap if I either have a Bow that doesn't need imediate Flat ^xB97123Fire^7/^x3F6DB3Cold^7/^xADAA47Lightning^7 Damage Craft or I have enough ^x8888FFTransmutes^7 for both Gems and Craft. If I can't afford it, I will stick to a 4-Link ^x70FF70RoA^7 with ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks ^7or ^x7070FFTrinity^7 based on the Sockets If I get a ^xE05030R^7^x7070FFB^7^x70FF70GG ^7I will buy both ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 and ^x7070FFTrinity^7 and link them up with ^x70FF70RoA^7
Lab 2: At this Point I want to force the Swap, ^x70FF70LA^7 is way stronger then ^x70FF70RoA^7 with ^xAF6025Far Shot^7, so I will look for Links & Currency for Gems in advance and once out of Lab, will buy the Gems and swap.
^xD02090--- Artillery Ballista VS Manaforged ---^7 If you have a personal Preference go for that. My Preference and Recommendation is ^x70FF70Artillery Ballista^7
The Reason I prefer ^x70FF70Artillery Ballista^7 over a ^x70FF70Manaforged^7 Rain setup is that I can force higher Singletarget on max Range. When utilizing maximum Far Shot Range, Rain Skills won't target as they are out of range.
While running campaign/mapping I can just place a ^x70FF70Artillery Ballista^7, inbetween movement skills, and move on, when I am not commiting to clearing a pack. If it kills, awesome, otherwise is whatever, it would have been a bonus anyway.
^xD02090-- Manaforged Setup --^7 At most I recommend a ^x70FF70Manaforged Storm Rain Setup^7 if you have spare Sockets and Currency ^x70FF70Manaforged^7 + ^x70FF70Storm Rain^7^7 + ^x70FF70Culling Strike^7 and later on ^x7070FFPower Charge on Crit^7 is a great ^x70FF70Manaforged^7 Setup for applying a lot of Hits which we use for ^xAF6025Cornered Prey^7
^xD02090-- Shrapnell Balista Setup --^7^7 Shrapnell Ballista is only there to help on ^x8888FFBlue Packs^7, ^xFFFF77Rares^7 and ^xAF6025Uniques^7, cause of that it has a ^xD02090low Link Priority^7 Upon reaching Level 16, if I am lacking ^x70FF70Green Sockets^7, I drop ^x70FF70Pierce^7 from the ^x70FF70Shrapnell Ballista^7 When I have a ^xE05030R^7^x70FF70G^7(^x70FF70G^7) available, I grab ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 as a Reward for killing ^xAF6025Weaver^7 and link it to the^x70FF70 Shrapnell Ballista^7 ( and Pierce if ^xE05030R^7^x70FF70GG ^7available)
^xD02090--- Aura Setup ---^7
Defensive: ^x70FF70Herald of Ice ^7at Level 16 and ^xE05030Anger^7 at Level 24 Replace ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 when specing into ^xAF6025Leader of the Pack^7 with ^x70FF70Grace^7 and use ^x70FF70Haste^7 when running zones and Anger on Bosses [Always use ^xE05030Anger^7 if needed to keep ^x7070FFTrinity^7 up]
Aggressive: ^x70FF70Herald of Ice ^7at Level 16 and ^xE05030Anger^7 at Level 24 Replace ^x70FF70Herald of Ice ^7when specing into ^xAF6025Leader ofthe Pack^7 with ^x70FF70Haste^7 Replace ^x70FF70Haste^7 with ^x70FF70Grace^7 upon entering Maps
^xD02090=== Leveling Progression ===^7 Look for ^x8888FF^7Essence of ^x8888FFAnger^7^7^7, ^x8888FFWrath^7, ^x8888FFHatred^7, ^x8888FFWoe^7,^x7070FFTorment^7 & ^x8888FFGreed^7 Look for Bow Upgrades every few Level and use Essence to upgrade Bow to Rare Also unlock Faustus in Kingsmarch and buy Bows if you have enough Gold and need a Upgrade Use Essence of Woe on Quivers for % Bow Damage
^xD02090|| Act 1 ^7^xD02090||^xD02090 ^7Look for ^x70FF70G^7-^x70FF70G^7-^x70FF70G^7, ^x70FF70G^7-^x70FF70G^7-^xE05030R^7 and Runner Boots first few Town Visits You need generaly two^x7070FF Blue Sockets^7 a few ^xE05030Red Sockets^7 and ^x70FF70MANY Green Sockets^7. If you aren't looking for perfect campaign time, use a Body Armour early to help with Socket Pressure.^7
Vendor Regex: ^xAF6025g-g-r|g-[gr]-g|r-g-g|nne|rint|s:.+bow^7^7
^xD02090| First Town |^7 Get ^x70FF70Galvanic Arrow ^7Use^7 ^x70FF70Galvanic Arrow ^7+^7 ^x70FF70Momentum^7
^xD02090| Tidal Island |^7 Get ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7, ^x70FF70Shrapnell Ballista^7, ^x70FF70Dash^7 Buy ^x70FF70Pierce^7, ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7 Use ^x70FF70Galvanic Arrow ^7+^7 ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 + ^x70FF70Momentum^7 ^x70FF70 Shrapnell Ballista ^7+^7 ^x70FF70Pierce^7^7 ^x70FF70 Dash^7, ^x70FF70Sniper's Mark^7
^xD02090| Lower Prison |^7 Get ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage ^7Buy^7^x70FF70 ^x7070FFFrost Blink^7 ^7Use^x70FF70 Galvanic Arrow ^7+^7 ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 + ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage^7 ^x70FF70Shrapnell Ballista ^7+^7 ^x70FF70Pierce ^7 ^7^x70FF70 ^x7070FFFrost Blink^7^7 Drop ^x70FF70Dash^7 ^7 ^xD02090| Brutus Kill |^7 Get ^x70FF70Blink Arrow^7 Use^x70FF70 Blink Arrow ^7+^7 ^x7070FFFrost Blink^7^7
^xD02090| Merveil's Cavern |^7 Get ^x70FF70Lightning Arrow ^7or^7 ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7 | based on preference and Gear ^7Buy^7 ^x70FF70^xE05030^xE05030^x70FF70Lesser Multiple Projectiles^7 [ you can use ^x70FF70Pierce^7 instead of ^x70FF70LMP^7, but overall ^x70FF70LMP^7 feels better ]^7 ^7Use^7 ^x70FF70Lightning Arrow ^7+^7 ^x70FF70Mirage Archer ^7^7+^7 ^x70FF70Lesser Multiple Projectiles^7 | Gemswap LMP with Momentum on Bosses ^x70FF70 Shrapnell Ballista^7 + ^x70FF70^7^x70FF70added Cold^7 | ^x70FF70Pierce^7 if using RoA
^7OR ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7 + ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 + ^x70FF70Added Cold^7
^xD02090|| Act 2||^7 ^xD02090| Baleful Gem |^7 Get ^x70FF70^xE05030^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 Use^7 ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7
Optional [ Recommended if you got Spare Sockets ] Buy ^x70FF70Bloodrage ^7Use^7 ^x70FF70Bloodrage^7
^xD02090| Weaver Kill |^7 Get ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 Use ^x70FF70Shrapnell Ballista^7 + ^x70FF70Added Cold^7/ ^x70FF70Pierce^7 [see above] + ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7
^xD02090|| Act 3 ||^7 Look for^x70FF70 GGG^x7070FFB^7^7 and/or ^x70FF70GGG^7^xE05030R^7 4 Links | Alternative ^x70FF70GG^7^xE05030R^7^x7070FFB^7 Use^7 ^x70FF70Lightning Arrow ^7+^7 ^x70FF70Mirage Archer ^7^7+^7 ^x70FF70Lesser Multiple Projectiles^7 + ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 or ^x7070FFTrinity^7^7 | Gemswap LMP with Momentum on Bosses OR ^x70FF70Rain of Arrows^7 + ^x70FF70Mirage Archer^7 + ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 + ^x7070FFTrinity^7 Buy additional ^xE05030Elemental Damge^7 & ^x7070FFTrinity^7 in A2 when needed
^xD02090| After Crematorium |^7 Get ^x70FF70Grace^7 Buy ^xE05030Anger^7 & ^x70FF70Haste^7 Use ^xE05030Anger^7 [ See Aura Setup above how to use after Level 24] Level ^x70FF70Grace^7 in Offhand
^xD02090| Gravicus Kill |^7^7 Get ^x70FF70Artillery Ballista ^7Buy^7^x70FF70 Faster Attacks ^7 ^7 Use^7 ^x70FF70Artillery Ballista^7 + ^x70FF70Faster Attacks^7 + ^x70FF70Added Cold ^7+ ^xE05030Elemental Damage with Attacks^7 Drop Shrapnell Ballista
^xD02090|| End of Act 4 ||^7^7^7 Get ^x70FF70Barrage ^7Buy^7^x70FF70 Mark on Hit^7 & ^x70FF70Returning Projectile ^7^7 (optional | Don't need these Gem's till later)^x70FF70 Replace^x70FF70 Lesser Multiple Projectiles^7 with ^x70FF70Returing Projectiles ^7once you have +2 Projectile and 1+ Pierce from Tree
^xD02090|| Act 5+ || ^7Replace ^x70FF70Lesser Multiple Projectile^7 with ^x70FF70Barrage^7 on Bosses till ^x70FF70Returning Projectile^7 is viable. Check your Resistances and try to keep them maxed now, also be aware of your Accuracy Rating starting with Act 5, if you get some Life Rolls on Gear it might drop belowe Life, loosing you the Precise Technique Damage If that happens go for Accuracy Nodes early. Swap to Early Maps Gem Setup when finishing Campaign and Sockets become available

Skill.label: Lightning Arrow | Momentum/LMP Swap on Bosses
Lightning Arrow | Momentum/LMP Swap on Bosses
HoI untill Leader of the Pack
4l | Mark on Hit & Frostblink on Lifetap
